column4: Anybody know how to force my laptop screen to be bright?  It is dimmed bc the battery meter never recognizes it is plugged in
what Jeronimus said, should be FN+ some F-key
Jeronimus:  the problem is the battery meter always thinks it is on battery, even tho it is plugged in, even tho power management is turned off.
using the FN key should overwrite the auto-dimming
